subject: Boxing
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The flyweight Marlen Esparza and the middleweight Claressa Shields, both of the United States women’s boxing team, won their bouts Monday to advance to the semifinals.
snippet: The flyweight Marlen Esparza and the middleweight Claressa Shields, both of the United States women’s boxing team, won their bouts Monday to advance to the semifinals.
